channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Accountability Coming: DNI Gabbard Makes Criminal Referrals to DOJ on Alleged Leaks, 'Deep State' Actors

item.description: President Donald Trump used his social media platform Thursday to rebuke Fox News' pollster and the "China Loving" Wall Street Journal.

item.title: 'Biden effect' hits the Senate: Wave of retirements clears path for younger Dems
item.description: After Sen. Dick Durbin announced his retirement, the idea of the "Biden effect" came back into focus.

item.title: Hegseth Denies Ordering Pentagon Makeup Vanity Room
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has denied a report from CBS that he requested the setup of a vanity makeup room at the Pentagon.
